pageContext.title: How to buy Airtime through HALOPESA
pageContext.description: Access prepaid services from your account. Buy for yourself or buy to others in real-time. You can buy airtime quickly and conveniently using your HaloPesa account

children.value: 150*88# and select ‘3’ for airtime and bundles.
And you will receive a message notifying you briefly successes to buy airtime and to the amount of money you chose.
